text.div:
Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13265-4 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum
    23201-7 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    23202-5 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    27384-7 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    31486-4 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    31487-2 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    51819-1 Leptospira sp IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay
    56953-3 Leptospira interrogans IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
